body.name: Mihiliring 1080P Video Console Game, Retro Gaming Console with 621 Built-in Old Games, 2 Controllers, 4K HD HDMI Output, 8-Bit Plug & Play Classic Mini Video Game System for Kids and Adults as Gift
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 13 hrs 51 mins
features: 🎮【Rich Classic Video Games】- Get ready to take a trip down memory lane with the Retro Classic Game Console! With over 800 preloaded games, including your old favorites, you'll never run out of options. Plus, the ability to save game play and download new games makes this system a must-have for any retro gaming enthusiast.

🎮【Crisp Picture Quality】 The HDMI output provides a clear picture and supports 4K resolution for an even better gaming experience. Plus, it's lightweight and portable, making it easy to use with compatible devices.

🎮【HDMI Output】- The retro gaming console has an HDMI output, which provides a much clearer picture quality compared to AV output. It's also lightweight and portable, making it easy to carry around and use with compatible devices. Additionally, it supports 4K resolution for an even better gaming experience.

🎮【Promote Parent-Child Communication】- Use this retro classic game console to bond with your children and create lasting memories. You can play with friends and family members in friendly competition.

🎮【Perfect Gift for All Ages】- Surprise your loved ones with this virtual reality gaming system that's perfect for creating happy childhood memories. It's also a great choice for special occasions like birthdays, Christmas, Thanksgiving, and Valentine's Day.

🎮【Warmly Tips】Experience gaming as it evolved in the early years of gaming. Graphics and game play is from that time and a little rougher then what you are used to in today's world and thus very challenging.While the graphics of the original 80’s and 90’s games have its limits and can appear glitchy the HDMI cable and modern TV’s do improve the overall quality of the graphics.
body.description: Mihiliring 621 Classic Retro Game ConsoleHDMI Output, Support TV, PC Screen or Projector with HDMI PortThe HD 621 classic mini retro game console has a convenient HDMI port that is compatible with most TVs, PC Screens, and projectors used in modern families. Check that your output device has an HDMI output.Game Categories, Enabling Quick Game SearchAction gamesShooting gamesSports gamesFighting gamesRacing gamesPuzzle gamesNOTE !!!1. The controller connected to the right port is the secondary controller. It only works only when you have selected the 2 players mode and when it's the 2nd player's turn to play. Only the left controller(the primary one) can be used to control system options.2. After selecting a game, if you want to change to another game, press "RESET".3. This is a third-party game console.4. You cannot save the game progress. You can pause the game using ‘‘Start’’.5. The image quality will not be as clear as today's games.6. You may find some duplicate games in it. That's because the games are different versions and have different fun！Package Includes:1 * Classic Mini Retro Game Console2 * Classic Mini Game Controllers1 * AC Adapter1 * HDMI Cable1 * User Manual

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Full of memories
reviews.reviewText: As soon as I got the game console, I couldn't wait to unpack it, install it and start playing. Immediately it was like going back over 40 years ago to when I was a kid playing video games that still look like classics today, like Contra. The game console is plug-and-play. Although the graphics are not as good as those of today's games and are still 2D, I still like it very much. But the description is some kind of misleading, the game console cannot save game progress, and not support new games downloaded from the Internet. However, the pre-installed games are quite enough for me to play, which is very suitable for people like me who cannot handle the modern games out there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
